description:
Nestled in a quiet street and just moments to the Ravenswood Hotel & riverfront where you can enjoy the very best boating and fishing comes this great buying opportunity. Offering a spacious 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom home with a large open plan kitchen, dining, family, theatre, and home office, this home is set to accommodate even the largest of families.

What is evident from the moment you enter is a sense of space. Sprawling over 200sqm of internal living, the property also boasts the perfect outdoor entertainment area. With an alfresco area under the main roof, you will also find a huge gabled patio area that provides an abundance of undercover space to entertain the family and friends all overlooking the below-ground pool.

Bring the toys as the property's corner position has allowed for side access to a powered workshop and ample space to hardstand the boat, caravan or trailer if required.


Additional features include:
* 4 huge bedrooms – each with built-in or walk-in wardrobes
* Master with ensuite & walk-in wardrobe
* Large second bedroom with shower, vanity, and a deep bath
* Ducted air conditioning
* Theatre room & separate home office or 5th bedroom if required
* Huge open plan kitchen, dining, living
* Kitchen fitted with an abundance of bench space, stainless steel appliances, range hood, modern tap ware, dishwasher & fridge freezer recess, corner pantry, and shopper's entrance
* Large alfresco under the main roof with expansive additional gabled patio
* Solar power system
* Below-ground swimming pool
* Powered workshop with easy access gates
* Double lock-up garage
* 682sqm corner block

Ravenswood sits on the banks of the Murray River just 10 minute's drive to both Mandurah and Pinjarra town centres and 1km to the Forrest highway giving easy access to Perth in under an hour. Contact the exclusive selling agent Dane Stanley to arrange your private viewing and secure this great home to avoid disappointment!!
